argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | int-addassocd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | int-addassocd.2 | |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | int-addassocd.3 | |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | int-addassocd.4 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_addassd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + C ) + D ) = ( A + ( C + D ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( A + ( C + D ) ) = ( B + ( C + D ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> ( B + ( C + D ) ) = ( ( A + C ) + D ) ) |
